jcr:content.jcr:description: The new Escalante 3 features a refreshed style for a better fit on the road. This versatile road shoe is ready for your everyday run designed for a classic, comfortable ride.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Escalante 3
jcr:content.pageTitle: The New Escalante 3â€”A Refreshed Road Shoe.

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML:
THE NEW ESCALANTE 3

REFRESH YOUR RUN.

customhtml2_11446045_966258071.customHTML: Get ready for premium style and fit updates to the classic Altra road shoe you know and love. From morning runs to afternoon errands, this refreshed Escalante is designed for all-day versatility. Step into the road shoe that makes its own rules.

image.alt: Shot of rear portion of Altra Lone Peak 6, showing the Ego midsole.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
A REFRESH
TO A CLASSIC.

The Escalante 3 is here with an all-new modern look. This Altra classic features a refreshed design with new upper material with added elastic for an improved fit to your foot.

customhtml2_copy.customHTML: VERSATILITY MEETS FOOTSHAPEâ„¢ COMFORT. The new Escalante 3 features our Standard FootShapeâ„¢ Fit, our most common fit found in Altra shoes. This fit allows your feet to sit naturally and is designed to give you more stability in every step, on your run or out on the town.

image.alt: Shot of rear portion of Altra Lone Peak 6, showing the Ego midsole.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
CUSHION FOR ALL-DAY ACTION.

The Escalante 3 features our signature Altra EGOâ„¢ midsole foam designed for an all day, cushioned underfoot feel. This cushioned ride holds true to the classic features of the Escalante while adding a refreshed feel to each step.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
REFRESHED UPPER.
Our refreshed upper offers a more secure and snug fit than the previous Escalante. Made to keep up with whatever the day throws your way, this engineered knit upper is designed to offer a better fit and a lightweight feel.

video.description: Launch video for the all-new Escalante 3 from Altra Running.

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML: REFRESH YOUR RUN.
